content: प्रमाथः {@--1@} Excessive paining, tormenting, torturing. {@--2@} Agitating, churning. {@--3@} Killing, slaughter, destruction; सैनिकानां प्रमाथेन सत्यमोजायितं त्वया <ls>U. 5. 32</ls>; <ls n="U. 5.">4.</ls> {@--4@} Violence, outrage. {@--5@} Rape, forcible abduction. --थाः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> Epithet of the fiends attendant upon Śiva.
